"Oh, you're here too, <%me>.": "What are you up to?"
"You taking a break too?"
"Taking a bit of a break. You too, huh?"

"Yeah. I thought I'd take
a breather after coming back."

"I like to look out
at the town from here."

"To see all the people going about their lives,
all the kids playing around without a care in the world."

"It's really soothing to just let my mind
drift around aimlessly in the scenery."

"Central City is a really
great place, isn't it?"

"...Back when I lived in Aelio Town, I didn't
have many opportunities to visit this place."

"Not to mention, I was so small back then,
so this huge open city seemed kinda scary."
"But now, I love it here."

"The Operators and everyone who's always there to help,
all the friendly shopkeepers..."

"The Supply Corps, the maintenance workers,
and all the researchers..."

"All the kids,
and all the adults who raise them..."

"I've never been there, but there's also the subterranean facilities,
with all the people who handle agriculture and weaponsmithing..."

"Everyone supporting everyone,
supporting this whole city."

"So that's why I want do my part
to support everyone in this city as well."
"As a member of ARKS."

"Until now, I've always been the one who's been protected,
but now I can do the protecting."
"You've really been working hard."
"I'll be trying my best right alongside you."

"Oh? You think so?
It really makes me happy to hear you say that."

"Yeah, you're right.
Let's give it our all!"

"...Well, I think I've found my second wind,
so I'm gonna get going."

"I've still got a whole bunch of
stuff I still have to do."
"See you around!"
